name: Healf Intermediate Holdings LLC
description: Provider of financial services intended for major medical expense insurance. The company offers to pay up to 90% of the refundable amount and take care of the process with the insurer, enabling clients to focus on their recovery.
one_liner: Provider of financial services intended for major medical expense insurance. The company offers to pay up to 90% of the refundable amount and take care of the process with the insurer, enabling clients to focus on their recovery.
